name: Adventure.Exe
description:
So I wanted to try something new and flex my mini game muscle. I had picked up Pico-8 a while ago and never really got to messing with it. So this was made following a tutorial on youtube by Dylan Bennet Thank you so much for making that if you happen to run across this. 

No I'm not giving up on Godot. I just like the notion of tiny games. Kinda like tiny homes.
